items.title: National Conference / Seminar / Symposium
content: 2nd National Level Conference on “Innovations in Cyber Security and Information Engineering” (ICSIE’26) (Hybrid Mode) on 06.03.2026.
Third National Conference “Technical Innovation and Advancement in Computational Science” (NCTIACS -24) -held on Feb 09, 2024.

Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted the First International Conference on Emerging Research in Computational Science – 2023 held on 07th – 9th December at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education, Coimbatore brought together around 300 participants from various academic colleges and industry across the globe.

The Department of CSE has organized a Second National Conference on ‘Technical Innovation and Advancement in Computational Science – NCTIACS -23’-held on 06th February 2023 Ms. K.Sathya, Regional Sales Manager, Dell Technologies, Coimbatore,Ms. Salonisinghal Project Manager, Intel Digital Asia Pacific & amp are invited.

The Department of CSE has organized a National Level Technical Symposium”RISOVOX-23” on 9thFeburary 2023The keynote session was presented by the eminent Mr.P.Thirumoorthy Tech Lead, TrusTrace, Coimbatore.
Department of CSE organized an “International Virtual Conference on

Advancements in Computational Sciences Alexander Muthurengan Murugaiyan, Senior Lecturer, Department of Computer and Information Science, University of Seychelles, East Africa,Gokulnath Baskaran, Network Architecture, Cognizant Worldwide Limited, London, United Kingdom , Rinesh S, Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science, Jigjiga University, Ethiopia were invited.as Chief guest held on 09 th April 2021
Dr.B.Arunkumar, delivered Machine Learning Paradigm-Seminar on AICTE sponsored STTP Organised by Sri Krishna College of Engineering, Coimbatore on 9<sup>th</sup> December,2020
Dr.R.Dhanapal, delivered seminar on Network Tools and Practices-Vivekananda College of Engineering for Women-Department of ECE, 18<sup>th</sup>November,2020.
Department of Computer Science and Engineering organizes National level Technical  Symposium named “AURA 2k20” on 17.02.2020.
A Seminar on Design Thinking, Nair Vishal Vijay , EDP Coordinator, Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Deemed to be University for II and III Year Students on 11.12.19

Department of Computer Science and Engineering organised State Level Conference on Advancements in Computational Sciences- Mr.K.Santhosh Kumar, Social Media Analyst, Accent Techno Soft, CBE.delivered the keynote address on 10 th March, 2020 &amp; 11 th March, 2020.

A Seminar on Digital Electronics Mr.K.Moorthi, Chief Trainer(Retd) in Telecommunication at Signal and Telecommunication Workshop,Southern Railways, Podhanur for II year Students on 28th  August 2019(FN), 29th  August 2019, 30th  August 2019.
A National Level Conference on Computational Sciences organized by the Department of CSE on April 04, 2018. 82 Participants from various Engineering colleges have attended the Conference.

A National Level Conference on Advancement in Computational Sciences’17 was organized by the Department of CSE on February 18, 2017. Mr.Vishnu Potty, Vice President, Cognizant Technology Solutions, Chairman- CSI, Coimbatore Chapter was the resource person.

A National Level Technical Symposium on Innovation in IT was organized by the Department of CSE on February 07, 2017. The invited speaker was Dr.N.K.Karthikeyan, Professor & Head, Dept of IT, Karpagam College of Engineering, Coimbatore.

A National Level Conference on Wireless, Mobile Computing and Vehicular Networking was organized by the Department of CSE on April 05, 2016. The Experts were Dr.P.Yogesh, Professor, Dept of ICT, Anna University, Guindy Campus, Chennai and Dr.M.Marikannan, Professor, Dept of CSE, IRTT, Erode.
A National Level Technical Symposium DAEMON 2K16 was organized by the Department of CSE on February 16, 2016.
CSE Department has organized a Seminar on Internet of Things on January 06, 2016. Mr.Manikandan, Project Engineer, Newareeliya Soft Tech Pvt. Ltd, Coimbatore.

A National Level Conference on Emerging Trends in Information technology (NCETIT) was organized by the Department of CSE on February 26, 2015. 47 Participants from various Engineering colleges have attended the Conference.
A National Level Technical Symposium was organized by the Department of CSE on January 22, 2015. A total number of 129 Participants from various Engineering colleges have attended the Symposium.

A National Level Conference on Emerging Trends in Information technology (NCETIT) was organized by the Department of CSE on February 26, 2015. 47 Participants from various Engineering colleges have attended the Conference.

items.title: FDP
content: Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted a Faculty Development Program On “AI Advancements: Faculty Empowerment in Deep Learning and Computational Intelligence “from 25-09-2023 to 03-10-2023.
Mr.T.Mohanraj and Dr.R.Dhanapal, organizes A Faculty development program on Introduction to React JS- Mr. K. RanjithPrabhu, Specialist Programmer, Infosys Pvt,Ltd, 7th November 2020.

CSE department organized a Guest Lecture on “Data Structures and Algorithms” on July 29, 2019 by Dr. S. Kanimuthu, Associate Professor, Department of Information Technology, Karpagam college of Engineering, Coimbatore.

CSE department organized a Guest Lecture on “Design and Analysis of Algorithms” on December 11, 2019 by Mr. Sudharshan, Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hindustan college of Engineering, Coimbatore.
CSE Department organized “Inauguration of Computer Science and Engineering Association-2017” by Mr.S.R.Vasanth, Chief Executive Officer, Vertace Consultants, Chennai on August 07, 2017.

Department of CSE has organized an Extension Activity on “Free Cloud Services” on February 23, 2017 by Dr.R.Santhosh & Dr.B.Arunkumar AP/CSE at Government Boys Higher Secondary School, Sulur, Coimbatore.

A Three Day BOOT CAMP on Angular JS was organized by the Department of CSE from January 06, 2017 to January 08, 2017.The resource person was Mr.T.Jayamurugan, Cloud & Devops Engineer, Karya Technologies, Chennai.
CSE Department has organized a Seminar on Career Guidance in Computer Science on January 04, 2017. Dr.Vijayalakshmi, Founder, Hi-Tech, Solutions, India was the resource person.

CSE Department has Organized a Faculty development program on “Research Challenges in Big Data and Cloud Computing” from September 16, 2016 to September 17, 2016.The Resource Person was Mr.A.Bharanidharan AP/CSE, SREC, Coimbatore.

A Microsoft Certified C-Training Program on Structural Programming Techniques in Software Development was organized by the CSE Department from August 29, 2016 to August 31, 2016.The chairperson was Dr.Vijayalakshmi, Founder, Hi-Tech, Solutions, India.

Association Inauguration was organized by the Department of CSE on “Life Skill Development” on August 22, 2016.The invited Dignitary was Mr.Prasanth R.Nayar, Dept of CSE, School of Engineering, Amrita University, Coimbatore.

CSE Department has Organized a Faculty development program on “Cloud Computing Basics and Hands on Experience on Cloud Simulator tool” on June 06, 2015.The Resource Person was Mr.K.RanjithPrabhu, Software Engineer, KMIT Solution, Tidel Park, Coimbatore.

CSE Department has Organized a Faculty development program on “Big Data Analytics” on June 05, 2015.The Resource Person was Dr.Kannimuthu, Associate Professor, Department of CSE, Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore.

CSE Department has Organized a Faculty development program on How to apply for patents and intellectual property rights on April 24, 2015.The Resource Person was Mr.R.P.Ramanathan, Rtd CEO Tamilnadu Agriculture University.

CSE Department has Organized a Faculty development program on “Research Methodologies” on April 23, 2015.The Resource Person was Dr.Rajeswari Sivraj, Professor & Head, Department of Biotechnology, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education.
One day Faculty Development Programme: “Salesforce” is scheduled on September 16, 2017, by Mr.T.Jayamurugan, Karya Technologies, Chennai.

items.title: DLS
content: Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted a Lecture Series for the teaching faculty members “Student-Centered Pedagogy: A Paradigm Shift in Education” on 4.11.2023.
The Department of CSE has conducted Lecture Series on “Cyber Security-Threats, Security Issues and Awareness” on 12.07.2023.
Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted a Lecture Series for the teaching faculty members on “Unleashing Digital Possibilities with CISCO Packet Tracer” on 12.08.2023.
Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted a Lecture Series for the teaching faculty members on “Product Design and Development-Prototyping” on 26.08.2023.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducted a Lecture Series for the teaching faculty members “ Understanding the secret of writing a good research paper” on 10.02.2024. Dr.L.Selvam, Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering.

The Department of CSE has organized a Lecture Series on “QUESTION PAPER SETTING” on 10th June,2023. Dr. B.Arun Kumar, Professor,KAHE explained the Bloom’s Taxonomy and it is a categorization that defines different levels of intelligence including thinking, learning, and understanding.

items.title: Alumni Talk
content: An Alumni Interaction Session on “User Centric Product Innovation” on 16 Oct 2023, Mr.S.Sanjay 2016-2020 B.E. – CSE, Looperality , was the resource person.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering organized an Alumni Interaction Session on “Introduction to Medical Transcription” on 24 Jul 2023. Mrs.V.P.Vijayalakshmi 2009-2013 B.E. – CSE, Quality Analyst, Infosys, MidVoice Transcript Solutions was the resource person.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering organized an Alumni Interaction Session on “AI in Software Testing” on 31 Jan 2024. Mrs.Infanta Abinaya K, batch (2011 – 2015), Software Testing Engineer, Park Global HR Services Private Ltd, Coimbatore.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering organized an Alumni Interaction Session on “Scope of Data Analytics” on Feb 01, 2024. Mr. Ashik D, batch 2017 – 2020, Technology Process Executive (Data Analyst), Silicon India, Bangalore.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering organized an Alumni Interaction Session on “Building Resilience” on Feb 09 ,2024. Mr.J.Godwin, batch (2017 – 2021), Ship Operations Coordinator, Sharaf Shipping LLC, Dubai

Dr. Partheepan Rudrapati started his insightful session by stating Intellectual property is a category of property that includes intangible creations of the human intellect, and primarily encompasses copyrights, patents, and trademarks.

items.title: Extension Activity
content: One-day National Level Technical Fest- 2K26  on 13.02.2026.

Department of Computer Science and Engineering in coordination with Extension cell, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education has successfully organized an Extension activity at Government School, Malumichampatty, Coimbatore on 01.09.2023 with the theme, Innovation & Entrepreneurship Outreach Program in Schools-Revolutionizing Connectivity: “Cutting-Edge Concepts in Internet of Things”.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering in coordination with Extension cell has successfully conducted an Extension activity for the school students on 11.03.2024 at Ottakkalmandapam, Coimbatore, with the theme “Innovative Realms: Exploring Boundary-Pushing Concepts in 3D Game Development”.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering in coordination with Extension cell and Rotaract Club, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education has successfully organized an Extension activity on 31st January, 2023 at Government School, Malumichampatty, Coimbatore with the theme “Cyber Safe Girl Awareness Programme”.
